definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

pinyin: sheng1 wu4 hua4 xue2 zhan4 ji4

sentences.english: This paper deals with the study on haemogram and blood biochemical parameters of 12 healthy Sichuan golden monkeys (Rhinopithecus roxellanae).
sentences.chinese: 测定了12只川金丝猴的血象和血液生物化学指标。

sentences.english: This is biological and biochemical codependence from our point of view.
sentences.chinese: 以我们的观点，这是生物学与生物化学的相互依赖。

sentences.english: The teaching system of biochemical experiment in the majors concerning biology was studied.
sentences.chinese: 对生物类专业生物化学实验教学体系进行了研究。

sentences.english: Academician Shang Yongfeng is a famous biochemist and molecular biologist.
sentences.chinese: 尚永丰院士是我国著名生物化学与分子生物学家。

sentences.english: Glycobiology has been recognized as "the last frontier" in biochemistry.
sentences.chinese: 糖生物学被认为是生物化学领域“最后的前沿”。

sentences.english: Murad credits advances in biochemistry with their discovery.
sentences.chinese: Murad将他们的发现归功于生物化学的发展。

sentences.english: So my biochemistry would change if I had a fever.
sentences.chinese: 如果发烧我身体的生物化学化境会发生变化。

sentences.english: This is the website of Biochemical and Biophysical Research Communications.
sentences.chinese: 这是《生物化学和生物物理学研究通讯》的网页。

sentences.english: Good bioscience &Bio-chemistry product, application and market knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 有生物和生物化学相关产品的应用和市场经验。

sentences.english: But biochemistry goes far beyond oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 但生物化学远远超出氧气。

sentences.english: Her research is breaking new ground in biochemistry .
sentences.chinese: 她的研究正在开辟生物化学的新开地。

sentences.english: The bile was also analyzed by means of biochemical techniques and lithogenic index(LI) was calculated.
sentences.chinese: 并采用生物化学技术行胆汁脂质分析，计算成石指数。

sentences.english: Enzymes are highly efficient and specific biochemical catalysts.
sentences.chinese: 酶是高效而专一的生物化学催化剂。

sentences.english: Basal biochemistry is the main course for the major of biochemical engineering.
sentences.chinese: 生物化学基础是生物化工专业的主干课程。

sentences.english: The calorie is the unit usually used for measuring the amount of energy transfer in biochemistry .
sentences.chinese: 生物化学中测定能量转移量的单位是大卡。

sentences.english: My Biochem lectures are in the morning, and the labs are in the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 生物化学的课安排在上午，实验在下午。
